name: Onion (tomster12)
description:
Onion

Description

Roll your onion around and avoid being diced!

While barraged by stronger and stronger attacks, try to get the highest score.

Use shield and speed-up power-ups to gain the advantage.

Score:
+1 score / second
+3 score on powerup

Controls

WASD: Movement
Space: dash

Credits
